sph.vaadin.ui

Class ComponentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • sph.vaadin.ui.ComponentFactory

  • public class ComponentFactory
extends Object
    ComponentFactory has some methods for basic component creation.

    Since:
    31.10.2013
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sami Holck, Juha Mäkilä

    • Method Detail

      • createImageButton

        public static Button createImageButton(String description,
                       String pathToIcon,
                       boolean enabled)
        Creates a new image push Button an optional icon image.
        Parameters:
        description - the description text of the image button.
        pathToIcon - the path to the icon image of the button.
        enabled - a boolean value specifying if the component should be enabled or not.
        Returns:
        the created component.
        Postconditions:
        RESULT.getStyleNames().equals(com.vaadin.ui.themes.BaseTheme.BUTTON_LINK)

      • createImageButtonWithCaption

        public static Button createImageButtonWithCaption(String caption,
                                  String description,
                                  String pathToIcon,
                                  boolean enabled)
        Creates a new image push Button an optional icon image.
        Parameters:
        caption - button's caption String. Caption is the visible name of the button.
        description - the description text of the image button.
        pathToIcon - the path to the icon image of the button.
        enabled - a boolean value specifying if the component should be enabled or not.
        Returns:
        the created component.
        Postconditions:
        RESULT.getStyleNames().equals(com.vaadin.ui.themes.BaseTheme.BUTTON_LINK)

      • createBlueButton

        public static Button createBlueButton(String caption,
                      boolean enabled,
                      String pathToIcon)
        Creates a new blue push Button with an optional icon image.
        Parameters:
        caption - button's caption String. Caption is the visible name of the button.
        enabled - a boolean value specifying if the component should be enabled or not.
        pathToIcon - the path to the icon image of the button or null.
        Returns:
        the created component.
        Postconditions:
        RESULT.getStyleNames().equals(SPH_Theme.BLUE_BUTTON)

      • createLargeBlueButton

        public static Button createLargeBlueButton(String caption,
                           boolean enabled,
                           String pathToIcon)
        Creates a new large blue push Button with an optional icon image.
        Parameters:
        caption - component's caption String. Caption is the visible name of the component.
        enabled - a boolean value specifying if the component should be enabled or not.
        pathToIcon - the path to the icon image of the button or null.
        Returns:
        the created component.
        Postconditions:
        RESULT.getStyleNames().equals(SPH_Theme.LARGE_BLUE_BUTTON)

      • createSmallBlueButton

        public static Button createSmallBlueButton(String caption,
                           boolean enabled,
                           String pathToIcon)
        Creates a new small blue push Button with an optional icon image.
        Parameters:
        caption - component's caption String. Caption is the visible name of the component.
        enabled - a boolean value specifying if the component should be enabled or not.
        pathToIcon - the path to the icon image of the button or null.
        Returns:
        the created component.
        Postconditions:
        RESULT.getStyleNames().equals(SPH_Theme.SMALL_BLUE_BUTTON)

      • createTextField

        public static TextField createTextField(String caption,
                        String prompt,
                        boolean enabled)
        Creates a new TextField component.
        Parameters:
        caption - component's caption String. Caption is the visible name of the component.
        prompt - component's prompt String.
        enabled - a boolean value specifying if the component should be enabled or not.
        Returns:
        the created component.
